subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: It was not a vintage performance by Matt Harvey, the young Mets right-hander, but he showed why he has become such a threat on the mound, despite the Mets’ loss to the Marlins.
snippet: It was not a vintage performance by Matt Harvey, the young Mets right-hander, but he showed why he has become such a threat on the mound, despite the Mets’ loss to the Marlins.
